entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Puntzi Mountain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puntzi Mountain 04:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear except partly cloudy over southern sections early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
